remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 配接器會設定支援所謂*第二個 UI*。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 第二個 UI 會使用必須顯示更多畫面的 UI 中，相同的方式，以 Windows 為基礎的應用程式會顯示對話方塊的控制項。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way that a Windows-based application shows dialog boxes. 如需有關第二個使用者介面的詳細資訊，請參閱[配接器集功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100))文件。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see the [Adapter Sets Functionality](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100)) documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會自動檢查連結的類型，並呈現適當的標記語言。This method automatically checks for the type of link and renders the appropriate markup language. 指定的目標可以參照另一個 URL，或在相同頁面上的表單。The specified target can refer to another URL or to a form on the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載的回傳的型別，若要設定的預設值。This overload sets the default value for the postback type to . 如果`mapToSoftKey`參數設定為`true`，文字`softkeyLabel`參數會顯示。If the `mapToSoftKey` parameter is set to `true`, the text of the `softkeyLabel` parameter is displayed. 下表顯示用於回傳類型`postBackType`引數。The following table shows the postback types used for the `postBackType` argument. |類型Type|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||回傳包含名稱和編碼的引數。The postback contains a name and an encoded argument.| ||回傳包含用來提交表單，而通常 _EVENTTARGET 和命令的控制項。The postback contains the control used to submit the form, typically an _EVENTTARGET and a command.| ||回傳包含名稱和變數的參考。The postback contains a name and a variable reference.| ||回傳包含名稱和引數。The postback contains a name and an argument.|

summary.span: 設定或傳回控制項的第二個使用者介面 (UI) 模式。

span.span: Sets or returns the secondary user interface (UI) mode for the control.

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

value.span: 控制項的任何第二個 UI 模式。

span.span: The secondary UI mode for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 配接器會設定支援所謂*第二個 UI*。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 第二個 UI 會使用必須顯示更多畫面的 UI，方式與在以 Windows 為基礎的應用程式中的對話方塊中的控制項。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way as a dialog box in a Windows-based application. 如需有關第二個使用者介面的詳細資訊，請參閱[配接器集功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100))。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see [Adapter Sets Functionality](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100)).
